bow: as young mom trying to befriend other moms this is me oh man that makes me so sad my mom friends really pulled me out of funk when we moved joined moms group on meetup call it mom dating and find it far more difficult than regular dating yes my exact experience where are all the moms in their mid 20s so awkward asking another woman for her number to set up play dates 34 and have the same problem everyone says they are lonely but no one wants to get together sad face yah was 21 when had daughter then we sent her to private school in nicer area the schools in our area were terrible and we did know where to live in the nicer areas yet was like 20 years younger than the next youngest parent was the same age as many of the teachers and staff but that was it so hard to get on with them hah 23 two kids hi but really there are any in my area live in the middle of nowhere and it really hard for me to get to the closest town especially in the winter all my mom friends are online because ca find any real live ones me and my kid usually just hang out all day and stuff we re each other bffs well if you re in mn in your area yep every other mother in my area with kids around our girl age is at least 10 years older totally different career places totally different concerns just bit south texas haha jeez had my son at 30 32 single mom and feel exactly the same way feel like it this way for moms of any age 35 with year old and go to the playground and feel ancient sigh do even feel ancient just feel like could possibly have anything in common with these chicks aside from squeezing basketball out of tiny hole it sucks maybe being jerk do know as if was introverted socially awkward penguin enough even more reluctant to make friends now that mom because paranoid what they ll think about my parenting ve already had pack of redditors try to dox me and call cps because they thought was gon na go all andrea yates on my kid feel your pain young single mom in small town sometimes feel like fucking pariah wonder if the people of mommit or singleparent would be interested in organizing play dates for our kids hi 23 two kids 24 two kids sounds like we need to form mommit playgroups for those who live nearby it seems we all feel this way wonder if this is universal moms in my playgroup seem to be drowning in friends or the type of mom who browses reddit is just different read cool as shit sure that had nothing to do with the fact that you were posting on reddit that you hated being parent and that you wished you had an abortion deleted deleted what part houston here 27 kid find have the opposite problem 29 and my daughter is 19mos most of the people know who have kids her age are super young and all the moms my age have kids that are significantly older the exception is one friend from high school whose kids are about two years older than lily have the same problem 29 and my girl is 19mos and all the moms are the playground are like 21 it not huge difference but big enough of one that super awkward around them deleted see the problem they all think you are going to eat them worse thing is they lool at you like there is something wrong with you for having kids before 30 look way younger then am too so never fit in with those moms lol deleted that interesting too most first time moms in my area are about your age do you struggle making mom friends as well do you feel less accepted because of your age ft worth so just about hours north every damn time is hating being parent fairly common view amongst parents feel your pain more than few times would go to these meet up things where no one knows anywhere else by the end of the event everyone would have made friends except for me gt let your friendships build naturally not trying to be snarky but how especially when ca go out in the evenings and my day time outings are restricted by baby needs naps how does one make friends just naturally mom dating is so hard joined baby and mom yoga and met few people want to befriend but do want to come on too strong do just casually ask for their number or suggest play date start mom group in my area next week maybe it will be easier that me too does help not local and do know what all the gossip means it like secret code do know the people or the injokes or anything yeah listening to moms go ca wait to get them into school all day would think so there certainly days where could do without children like days where sick and they are not or days where have no money and have to pay for the playgroup fees or days where they are just so incredibly whiney and have slept and have slept and the beds are wet *again* and you just want to walk out the door even days where really wish could take shower behind locked door without them trying to bang the door down within minutes because they need sandwich even though daddy was right in the room with them love my kids but wow they make me utterly bonkers 34 and that is me too swear trying to make other mom friends is like dating only with far more anxiety and stress had my son when was 22 joined local group for young and teen mothers it was such wonderful experience for me at the group they fed us and then would watch the kids and do sort of parenting class for us but there were all sorts of topics self care sleep healthy eating budgeting etc met three of my best friends through that class and we still keep up now maybe your community has something similar also found that even though looked young for my age when had my son managed to make lots of great mom friends just by going to playgroups and the local online mom forum also made mommy friends at my church some of my best mom friends are 10 years older than me and it all good as 28 year old older mom have plenty of friends in their low 20s would say my average mom friend would be about 24 my friend and are starting peer mentoring program for new young mothers we re launching it soon and really excited hope you are able to make some friends find going to playgroups and stuff the moms who know eachother chat among themselves more but if you go every week they will get to know you and eventually you ll have some friends seventeen year old mom no friends sigh 25 with kids with my oldest being it awkward going to parent teacher conferences for her and they say oh your her sister no her mother yes young can we please talk about how she is doing in school deleted think we are in the same boat in my town most girls have kids in high school or right out of high school my husband and did have kids until we were 28 so all the kids in town that my husband is friends with are between 10 not from here so do know anyone and any mom with young kids are in their early 20 and more concerned with the latest drama ca stand it is it wrong that want to be parent am crazy am 30 with two kids and so that puts me at the younger range of my mom friends but never really found this to be the case even though can be kind of shy and awkward when started staying home joined meetup group and was invited into regular play group that we have doing stuff with god the past years then year later started going to church again and holy batman so many super friendly moms feel like when we are talking about kid centric stuff age does really matter but do notice my older mom friends are more rigid and bit more boring like they are super into their nap schedules never leave their kids to go do stuff with their husbands etc nope wanted to be one too still do really love being mum love being stay at home mum and having the time to spend with them just would also love day week to myself have no nearby support system my parents are hours drive away and my husband family live on literally the other side of the world have nearby about an 30 minute drive aunt but she already caring full time for her partner that young kids usually are an option so feel bit more pressure with having no me time than others might if it is any consolation my group of mostly 30 something moms tried to befriend 24 yr old mom the poor thing think she was scared of us she hardly ever spoke and she alway seemed super tense but we enjoyed her company well enough and we all loved her son she never shows up to any of our group stuff anymore and for one miss her think ll shoot her an email just to see how she is doing gt just would also love day week to myself this seems to be fairly common sentiment amongst parents when have kids intend to set aside few thousand dollars to pay for sitters and carers to pay for both of us to have some time off if we need to that how it ll be for me too ll be 27 and my oldest will be look super young too so already get nasty looks for having year old and week old this is my problem too 31 and just had my first people here are constantly asking us how many kids we have then act surprised when we say she our first would love to find mom friend but have no clue how all the mom groups in town are religion based which is my thing then the local mom fb group is all women with older kids my lo is too young for play dates just yet but still like to find some friends experiencing the new mom thing feel you we ve moved to new area for my husbands job and even before the baby it been hard making friends in the fox valley area deleted yea understand what do understand is just because we are young does not mean we are not capable of taking care of child also have 2yr old and 10 mo old they are perfectly fine being young mother should not have to get dirty looks pretty much it just rude can understand if kids who have kids and can not fully take care of themselves let alone another child is understandable but do down the girls that did everything they could to give their kids the best of what they had you have no place here you made throwaway just to shame mom who was in dark place year ago meetup meetup meetup seriously joined dozens of local meetups for moms stalk rsvp lists for moms in my town with similar ages babies and message them with the least creapy hey also sahm mom in town let me know you like to get together for coffee someday few wrote back and ended up good friends with one woman which is enough to help keep my sanity www scarymommy com great community joined more than year ago they are fantastic we all parent our own unique way but we try to be excepting of those that parent differently than us not quite as backstabbing as babycenter check it out was going to reply to your post about young people having kids but then realized 27 with year old and month old old to be honest went and hunted down that post boy do understand what you were feeling but can also see why someone would have been concerned about the welfare of you and your child go back and read it with an outsiders eyes you were stressed to the max and said some things the reality is that ppd is very real an moms do things sometimes in the brink that they will regret trust me have seen it hope you can ignore one asshat comment here and would not be shocked if this is the one who was shaming you one year ago in the original post making throwaway just know we are lots of socially awkward penguins here know what you mean all too well only have one and he is am 32 and constantly asked when we are going to have second one we found non religious playgroup in my area but everyone in it is super religious anyway started taking my son when he was way too young to benefit 11 weeks old just so could meet people have little in common with them but still go anyway just to have interaction nice people just afraid what they think if they knew was agnostic think maybe sputnik maybe means do try to force the friendships with other moms unlike when you re younger the relationships with these women are no longer all about you they re about you and your kids ve made several friends through our playgroup found on meetup but honestly very few if any would be friendships would have formed naturally on my own had to step back and realize these women could be my friends just different kind of friend not bad just different still does feel like my old friends the ones chose myself but it nice to have any kind of interaction with other moms who understand what you re dealing with in life right now teach music lessons and often do clinics at the local high schools and one of the locations teach at is in high school consistently taken for student despite my fairly teacherly dress just hope my baby cheeks stick around long enough to be actually valuable no doubt we personally are financially stable married not that think you have to be married just bc we are young does mean we are capable do know soooome who have like kids 22 barely making min wage and just keeps popping em out ca afford the ones they have that what gives the rest of us bad name it funny how we all feel like the odd mom sure do anyway have lots of childless friends when try to befriend other moms feel like an alien this is the perfect image deleted feel your pain was seventeen when had my son 19 and only ever see of my friends and thats like times year totally feel your pain apparently literally the worst parent in the world because let my year old play with my phone and tablet do think pointing out why people were concerned for the wellbeing of her and her child constitutes shaming when you cry out for help like that on reddit people are going to reach out and try to help doxxing and calling cps is far from the whole story right now in college so it even harder to make mom friends or any friends my own age only reluctant to let my kid play with my phone because she has tendency to reset the wallpaper call grandma and then lock the phone but totally want to get tablet for her and load it up with all the abc counting shapes amp colors apps that turned my friend kid into toddler supergenius when first had my son had the same problem and found myself at the time getting annoyed with my old friends cuz they just did seem to get the responsibility now had took one class at the local community college and it helped me meet mom friends at the time it was nice just to go to class for hour days week and have these other moms to socialize with even though now years later ve lost contact with them do know how would have made it through that time without that small escape deleted as 23 mom having the same problem ll be your friend can certainly see why people would be concerned but what was pm to me from the facebook page seemed less rooted in concern for my kid and definitely lacking any concern for myself and more of the ungrateful mother does deserve to have kids let punish her for her bad feelings vein crap at dealing with stress know that but also know not in this alone and do lean heavily on the people around me who can offer help amp support some people are just so quick to jump on the could do better therefore they should be allowed to try at all bandwagon when it would only make things worse not better it is hard enough dealing with those people through computer screen the last thing want is to invite them into my life yes you re crazy but that okay because kids are crazy too oh man would love to get my kid into some kind of preschool for lot of reasons not only to get time to myself on the regular but have no idea what doing http www personal psu edu afr3 blogs siowfa13 science dog jpg when it comes to teaching my kid stuff sit there and go this is this is and she stares and me and like shit what am doing wrong but also because went to preschool as kid and loved it bet that what triggered my love of school in general was always the kid who hated missing school and my first depressive episode actually coincides with my graduating from college not that want my kid to be depressed when she finishes school but do want her to enjoy it as much as did just ca friggin afford the cost of preschool yesterday started with tantrum because she wanted cheerios and yogurt bites but *not together dammit* and concluded with an hour amp half of spontaneous hugs amp kisses kids are completely insane and they want us to join them are there not people who might be prepared to do this for free was reading about project in england where grandmothers were using webcams to teach kids in india basic english could you not try something like this bit more local like maybe there are some local grandmothers who are bored and retired and do have lot to do and would like to help out younger mothers for an hour week or something deleted there are people without kids who like hanging out with kids my best friend is one of them although she lives in another state right now some people are kid centric but just do have any of their own because of personal circumstances if you re one of the young moms maybe talk up the early childhood development majors at the local college friends who like your kid but wo have their own in tow and might be able to tell you wtf is up with this eating boogers phase am nanny but the struggle is similar solved my issue by printing up play date cards on vista print put my name the kids first names and ages and my phone number ended up with invitations to moms and mops playgroups random hey we are going to the park texts and some long lasting friendships for myself and the kids the cards made it very easy because could just hand one over nobody had to input anything into their phones or make an immediate commitment best ever spent edit you can also try to find mops group in your area http www mops org feel the same way living the dream right any of you moms in the portland area totally feel like this as well second the commenter who mentioned it was harder than regular dating have been shot down the few times ve tried to reach out and it stings man feel the same way never had many close friends and grew apart from the ones did before had my son have few friends who live far away from me but have no idea how to go about meeting new people in new area moved right after my son was born with baby involved and just started new job and the only thing had to talk about was my son people who do have babies do want to just sit there and listen to you talk about yours but its such hard work to find things to talk about that are the baby and its even harder for me to find people who have babies to be friends with meetup com has been sanity saver for me stay at home mom of two and maybe was lucky and just happened to find the perfect playgroup buy we have so many things to do now do think you are however be wary of the heavy usage though my friend year old has his own ipad and he would play on it for hours and hours and not play outside that bit neglectful one hours day is fine in my book wish can remember but believe there super kid friendly tablet that has absolutely no internet just apps not sure how downloading the apps will work and better parental controls than regular tablet that something you can try to find samsung galaxy kid think the leappad not the new ultra one is just apps no internet and has been perfect for my year old she got it from grandparents when she was and she could use much other than video then but is very proficient with it now and loves it the downside is that apps from their store are pricier than iphone android apps but you can get the download cards on sale and save money that way the worst at this make conversation easily small snippets easy comments ask questions easily but lack follow through there is hopeful look in some moms chat with and then tend to go after my child and keep my own agenda tending to walk away without tying up loose ends yeah my youger one is like that he wants sauce on the side and nothing to touch anything else but it pasta in bowl so this is impossible then he mixes it all in anyways also lots of kisses all over the face while digging his knees deep into my stomach pretty sure it against the geneva convention feel the same way 40 with year old think you have to keep an open mind about other parents when you see them in parent mode at the park or whatever that may have very little to do with the person they are when the kids are around it quite clear your intention was shame and negativity from your need to make throwaway to make your comments you are not alone try to set up mom dates and find it so much more difficult than actually dating have few friends with kid around my daughter age but holy moly is it so difficult to set up interract deleted well now have number people assume because do have toddler tagging along that she my first they say have another and she 10 boy do get the fishy eye yup 10 years apart ll let them concoct story as to why do need to explain myself to them that lot of us 35 and painful awkward artsy type with two kids and nearing we are in neighbourhood were most families are all around the same age but oh god is making mum friends hard we moved provinces and getting friendships established is stressful for me not for them they are friends with everyone ll be your friend ps the local mommit play group idea that was mention is good one not just kids in common but reddit too yay there tablet called the nabi that my niece has she loves it not sure about all the parental controls and whatnot though right behind you all the other mommies are what 12 17 tops there is also that pesky advanced maternal age conversation that comes up with your doctor when talking about more over it is that what the kids say now days think you re right and wrong have some friends in the 20 30 age bracket that adore but there are some big gaps sometimes the gaps make me feel old and crochety the gaps are real but the friendships are real too went to the same free and public kid events for months before started talking to some other mommies with any results and by results mean friendships that result in playdates first visit smiled second visit smiled and said hiya third visit we chatted while we were there and so on it was long slow process but was determined to make some mom friends yeah you kinda have to have conversation in order to befriend someone go on outings with my baby and try to make friends with other new moms but it really hard for two adults to have conversation with babies or toddlers in tow deleted that why questioned my jerkiness factor lol lil different living in cookie cutter suburb having moved from portland or if that makes any sense that the thing still myself in parent mode do spend lot of time having to differentiate always parent and always me sadly not in wi anymore but wooot for wi moms was 17 too hang in there met the nicest mom in target the other day we chatted for like 15 minutes there in the cleaning product aisle then walked away because would have felt sooooo awkward being like hey wan na get coffee sometime or do you know any good playgroups around here :sigh so had at this if had met my husband in college pretty sure have been single and awkward forever was totally like this before had kid loved hanging out with friends and their kids because was really clucky but often it felt like they were embarrassed about the focus their kids needed and backed off thanks my boyfriend and had to move to new town where we do know anyone and neither of our families are speaking to us it tough all of my friends live in different areas and since getting pregnant they ve slowly stopped talking to me think that what tends to happen for lot of mothers think so as well hey must really suck my two and half year old is getting tablet for christmas and he got cheap wee mobile we had spare ages ago he was scared or using phones and having his own that we could phone and tell to him on really helped meet other mums all the time but 90 of them are either the type of young mums who life has hardly changed since having baby still go out partying rely on their parents for everything use their children as fashion accessories do have clue how to look after themselves let alone child ect or look at me as though am that kind of mum then the 10 of reasonable mums do meet their children are much older than mine it really annoys me 41 and my daughter is 22 months old ugh finding mothers my age is impossible try being 41 with an almost year old where am you either are teen mom or in the case with all my friends go to school work through your 20s was the only one out of my friends to have baby in their early 20s it been really really fucking lonely yup in my case all the girls went to high school with are mothers of or but moved to go to college and never went back all my college friends are just now engaging and marrying or still in school have one friend with baby few months younger but she lives too far away to get together often hahahha that the funniest thing ve ever seen hope will be able to make mom friends it easier to give them your email address at least that what ve found well tumblr is blocked here at work so ca see the image but ll be all alls friends needs em almost 28 right already at that stage in life where never really sure with 19 month old have yo stepson who is with me full time and 24 also have mo did think was that young of mom until tried to make mom friends anyway if you re in the greater seattle area be my frieeennnndds
